entry.title: Numeric-hw01
entry.content:
2018年9月19日 Homework01

本次作业的源码下载链接

Problem 1 [Page 45 1.7]

  • Solution

    • 中心差分

      可以看出当$k=10^{-8}$ 达到误差最小，是由于其与分子的双精度误差
      的开方可比拟的缘故。 和例子1.3 很契合。

    • 向前差分

      可以看出当$k=10^{-6}$ 达到误差最小，并不和$h \approx \sqrt{\epsilon_{mach}}$ 一致。

Problem 2 [Page 46 1.9]

  • Solution

    • (b)通过计算: $\frac{x^n}{n!}$ 小于 计算机双精度$10^{-16}$作为计算停止准则。

    • (c)计算结果如下：

    • (d) 对于负数，由于级数相邻两项符号不一致，而且大小在一个数量级上，相减会丢失精度。所以对负数情况可以求对应的正数再取倒数，测试结果如下:

    • (e) 对负数情况进行分组求和，如将正的放在一起和负的放在一起，最后相减(数值结果如下图)，等操作无法改善精度， 归根究底就是两个想近数相减引起的。因此可以下结论，交换重组项无法改善精度。

      $$e^{-x} = (\frac{x^{0}}{0!} +\frac{x^{2}}{2!}+ \frac{x^{4}}{4!} +\cdots ) -(\frac{x^{1}}{1!} +\frac{x^{3}}{3!}+ \frac{x^{5}}{5!} +\cdots )$$

Problem 3 [Page 46 1.9]

(Matlab test) For $n=500, 1000,2000, 4000, 8000$, generate an $nn$ random matrix B, and an $n1$ vector b.

Find the symmetric matrix $A=B^{\tau} \cdot B$
1) Using function “eig” to test the time cost for eigen decomposition;
2) Using $x=A / b$, and $x=A^{-1}\cdot b$ to test the time cost in finding the solution of $Ax=b$;
3) Plot all the time costs as a function of n and the power law for the time costs.

  • Solution
    • 1) 计算结果如下：
    • 2) 计算结果如下：
    • 3) 如下图：
entry.summary: 2018年9月19日 H

entry.title: Changchun and Handan
entry.content:
住过四百一天的智选酒店，住过一百一一天如家。这期间感叹甚多。

I lived Holiday Inn Express, 400 RMB a day.
And now I live in Home Inn ,110 RMB a day


On August 2rd, starting from Shanghai Hongqiao, taking high-speed train G1258 to Changchun took me 11 hours.
Stay in Holiday Inn Express and stay there for two weeks.
The hotel arranged by Jilin university, I heard that it
is four stars hotel, but I search it on the Internet and find nothing
about four stars, and only one about that is the official statement that
our company’s direction of development is between four stars hotel and
economy hotel. Regardless of the level of Holiday Inn Express, I felt comfortable living there, 400 RMB a day, not to pay by myself. On August 17, i took high-speed train to Handan,

不过在那里住的还是很舒服，400块一天，不是自己掏钱倒也享受其中。后来8月17号坐高铁G1276 到邯郸，这下自己掏钱，没有能力住那么贵的 酒店。110一天的如家住三个晚上，对比智选酒店，价格上便宜很多，环境也差很多。感叹一句：有钱真好，多挣钱。

邯郸有个路边小吃：驴肉卷。环境好差，8块一卷，而且肉质好差好难吃。
这类路边小吃，往往小作坊，卫生状况极差。我看着制作过程，没有手套

$$ f(t

entry.title: transport01
entry.content:
Book: 输运理论 黄祖洽

multiscale Transport modeling & computation

gas dynamics:

  1. navier-stokes equation :

$k_n = rac{l}{L}$

  • flud element
  • hydrodyamic
  • （宏观）
  1. boltzmam equation
    • “particle”
    • mean free path
    • kinetic scale （介观）

radiative transfer (optical thick)

  • 光子和物质相互作用
  • optical thick diffusion
  • plasma -vlasov eqn 无碰撞 + maxwell + two phase flow
  • magnetic-hydrodynamics
    • two fluid model
    • hall MHD
    • ~ ~ ~
  • idea magnetic-hydrodynamics

different level of description

  1. microscopic （微观）( resolution to particle )
    • Hamiltonian - Newton’s Law
    • indiviual paritcle

$$P_r = - rac{\partial H}{\partial q_r}$$

$$q_r = - rac{\partial H}{\partial p_r}, r = 1,2,…3N$$

$$ H = \sum_{1}^{N} kinetic + potential
$$

  1. mesoscopic （介观）

(不能跟踪每个粒子 )

mean free path 空间自由程$l_1$

collustion time $ au_1$

botzmann eqn & distribution function $ ho(x,t,u)$ 7-dim

微观 推导 介观 （BBGKY) 无法给出中间尺度

  1. macroscopic (宏观)
  • Navier-stoks
  • MHD
  • two phase flow
  • multiphase flow

$$ ho , V, T (x, t): 4-dim $$

Newtone -> boltzmann -> NS
single particle .. 尺度逐渐变大
Boltzmann -> NS

  • chapmann enskog expansion
  • burelt supris~
  • moments – Grad 13, 26, 35 距方程

中间尺度 (非平衡物理 unexplore)： “shock Structure”
可能的理论

Difficulties

  1. degree of freedom
  • NS (5 degree)
    • conservation law $ ho , ho v, ho E$
    • Boltzmann($\infty$ degree)

不是守恒量的确定方程 自然界没有:

$$ rac{\partial T_x}{\partial t} + ……$$
$$ rac{\partial T_{xy}}{\partial t} + ……$$

Discontinuous Galerkin “DG”

  • 网格有更多自由度提高精度 (相当于对原控制方程求)

$$
rac{\partial}{\partial x} : ho _x + ( ho u)_x =0
$$

  • compact high-order
  • 不是直接建模不可能成功
  • 从Boltzmann 方程直接推出中间尺度 ，难成功

Bolzmann 两体碰撞

  • trasnsport & collision decouple
  • $\delta t \leq au, \delta x \leq l$ 前提
  • 如果$\Delta x \approx 5l, \Delta t \approx 5 au$ ，未知领域

Numericall metheds

  • macro
  • NS
  • MHD
  • multiphase

Numerical PDE

  • Boltzmann
    • DVM
    • SN
  • vlasov

particle methods

  • Direct simulation monte carlo (DSMC, bird 1960) 稀波流 稀薄气体
  • IMC
  • PIC
  • $\Delta x\sim rac{l}{3}, \Delta t \sim rac{ au}{3} , 64nm$ 计算量巨大

multiscale modeling

  • Scale $(\Delta x,\Delta t)$
  • discrete governing eqn
  • computation (多尺度)
  • $m=10$,飞机头部密度非常大，飞机尾部几乎真空。
  • 空天飞机，网格机头部分粒子很多NS eqn，尾翼粒子稀薄Boltzmann eqn
  • 卫星喷管，箱内密度很高NS方程，喷嘴外真空。

Contents

  1. NS eqn
    • continuum mechanics 连续介质流体 用微积分 离散更有优势。
    • 两个粒子黏在一块。
    • 流体微团没有物质交换

  1. Boltzmann Eqn

  2. Unified gas Kinetic Scheme

    • rarefied gas
    • raiation
    • Newton transport
    • plasma
    • two phase
    • Particle Version 化学反应
    • Navier-Stokes Equation : flud gas

Navier-Stokes Equation : flud gas

$ ho = rac{\Delta m}{\Delta v}$

  • kinematic properties:
    • Velocity acceleration vorticity
  • transport properties:
    • viscosity , thermal conductivity
  • Thermodynamic properties:
    • pressure, density temperature

  • location:

    • $X(t),Q(X(t),t)$
    • $ rac{dQ}{dt} = rac{\partial Q}{\partial t} + rac{\partial Q}{\partial X} rac{\partial X}{\partial t} + rac{\partial Q}{\partial Y} rac{\partial Y}{\partial t} + rac{\partial Q}{\partial Z}* rac{\partial Z}{\partial t}$

    • $= rac{\partial Q}{\partial t} +V \cdot abla Q$

      $$ rac{DQ}{Dt} = rac{dQ}{t} = rac{\partial Q}{\partial t} + \vec{V} \cdot abla Q $$
      $$ \vec{V} \cdot abla \vec{V} = abla rac{\vec{V}^2}{2} - \vec{V} imes ( abla imes \vec{V})$$

$$ \vec{w} = abla imes \vec{V}$$

Vorticity:

$$ rac{DV_i}{Dt} = rac{\partial V_i}{\partial t} + V_j \partial V_i$$

  • translation (3-degree)
  • rotation (3-degree)
  • extensional strain(3-degree)
  • shear strain(3-degree)
  1. Scale Vector
  2. second order tensor

$$ abla V = 0.5 ( abla V + ( abla V)^T)_ (shear Strain) + 0.5 ( abla V - ( abla V)^T)_ (rotation)$$

反对称张量只有三个自由度

对称张量有六个自由度

  • $\epsilon_{ij} = 0.5(\partial_j V_i + \partial_i V_j)$ 应变
  • stress：$ au_{ij} = f(\epsilon_{ij})$应力
    • Newton fluid
      • $ au_{ij} \sim \epsilon_{ij}$
    • Non Newton fluid

$F \sim \alpha rac{dV}{dy}$ 满足此式是牛顿流体

  • $ au_{\alpha eta}e_{\alpha}e_{ eta}$

    • $\alpha$ direction of normal
    • $\alpha$ direction of force

  • $f = n \cdot au = f_n + f_t$

  • $f_n = (n \cdot f)$
  • $f_n = (n \cdot f) n = n \cdot (n \cdot au) n = (n n : au) n$
  • $f_t = f - f_n = n \cdot au - (nn: au) n = f \cdot (I - n n)$
  • $ au \sim ( abla V + ( abla V)^{T})$

Symmetric tensor

$moment = I rac{dW}{dt} -> 0$ 力矩

$\int\int (r imes f) ds = I rac{dw}{dt}$

$f = n\cdot au$

流体微团趋于零：$ au_{ij} = au_{ji}$

$$ au_{ij} = -P \delta_{ij} (hyrostatic Pressure) + \mu[ rac{\partial V_i}{\partial x_j}+ rac{\partial V_i}{\partial x_j} - rac{2}{3} abla \cdot \vec{V}]$$

Equation of compressible Viscous flow

  1. mass conservation 流体微团:
  • 跟着流体微团：$ rac{Dm}{Dt} = 0$
    • $ rac{D}{Dt} ( ho V) = ho rac{DV} {Dt} + V rac{D ho }{Dt}= 0$
    • $= ho v abla v + v rac{D ho}{Dt}$

$ rac{D V}{Dt} / V = abla \cdot V$

$$V ( ho abla \cdot V + rac{\partial ho}{\partial t} + V \cdot abla ho) =0$$
$$ rac{\partial ho}{\partial t} + abla \cdot ( ho V)= 0$$

monmentum Eq:

$$ rac{ ho v V}{Dt} = body force + surface force$$
$$ ho v rac{DV}{Dt} = ho V g + v V \cdot au$$
$$ ho rac{DV}{Dt} = ho \vec{g} + abla au$$

$$ rac{\partial ho V}{\partial t} + V\cdot ( ho VV - au) = ho g$$

$$\vec{f}_{surface} = \int \int au \cdot n dt = \int \int \int abla \cdot au dv = abla \cdot au V$$

Energy Eqn: (流体微团)

1st-laws of thermaodynamics:

$$
E = ho \hat{V}(e + 0.5 V^2 - g \cdot r)
$$

$m= ho \hat{V}= const$

$$ rac{DE}{Dt} = rac{DQ}{Dt} + rac{DW}{Dt}$$

  • 热交换
  • 对外做功

$$
rac{DQ}{Dt} = \int\int -q \cdot n dx = -\int \int \int - abla \cdot q dV = - abla \cdot q \hat{V}
$$

Assumption Fourier’s Law : $q = -R abla T$ (其中一个假设，可换成其他 不一定对)

$$q \approx g$$

$$
rac{DW}{Dt} = \int \int ( au \cdot n)\cdot V dS = \int \int v \cdot ( au \cdot n) ds
$$

$$
= \int \int \int abla \cdot (V \cdot au)dV = abla\cdot (V\cdot au)\cdot V
$$

(力点乘速度等于功)

$$ ho ( rac{De}{Dt} + rac{D( rac{1}{2} V^2)}{Dt} + rac{D}{Dt} (-g \cdot r)) = abla \cdot (k abla T) + abla \cdot (V \cdot au)$$

e : internal energy (therinal )for unit mass

粒子3个translation degree ， 粒子内部旋转振动有k个自由度。

each egreee of reedom shares the same amount of energy

m: molecula mass

$$
e = rac{1}{m} ( k + 3) rac{1}{2}\hat{k} T
$$

$\hat{k}$ : : Boltzomann constant , T temperature

  • $C_v$ specific heat at constant volume
  • $C_p$, at constant pressure
  • $r,R$

$$ \delta Q= C_v dT$$

$$de = rac{1}{m} rac{k+3}{2} \hat{k} dT = C_v dT = rac{k + 3}{2} R dT$$

$$C_v = rac{k + 3}{2}R , rac{k}{m} =R$$

加多少热量保持压力不变：

$$\delta Q = C_p dT = C_v dT + P dV = C_vdT + R dT$$

$p = ho R T , p = rac{1}{V} RT, PV = RT$

$$C_p = C_v + R = rac{k + 3 +2 }{2}R$$

$$\gamma = rac{C_p}{C_v} = rac{k + 5}{k + 3} = 5/3 ,k =0; 7/5 = 1.4,k=2; isothermal, k= \infty;$$

energy:

$$ ho ( rac{De}{Dt} + rac{D rac{1}{2}V^2}{Dt}) = abla \cdot (V\cdot au) ext{流体加速运动} + abla\cdot (\hat{k} abla T) ext{热量}$$

momentum:

$$ ho rac{DV}{Dt} = abla \cdot au$$

$$ abla \cdot (V \cdot au) = V \cdot ( abla \cdot au) + au_{ij} rac{\partial V_i}{\partial x_j}$$

thermal energy eqn:

$$ ho rac{De}{Dt} = abla \cdot (\hat{k} abla T) + au_{ij} rac{\partial u_i}{\partial x_j}$$

$$ au = -P \delta_{ij} + \sigma_{ij}$$

$$
P abla \cdot V = - rac{P}{ ho} rac{D ho}{Dt} = ho rac{D}{Dt} rac{p}{ ho} - rac{D ho}{Dt}
$$

$$
ho rac{D}{Dt} (e + rac{p}{ ho}) = rac{DP}{Dt} + abla\cdot (\hat{k} abla T) + \sigma_{ij} rac{\partial V_i}{\partial x_j} (heat)\geq 0
$$

$$ ho rac{Dh}{Dt} = rac{Dp}{Dt} + abla \cdot (\hat{k} abla T) + \Phi $$

termodynamic identity:

$$dh = C_p T + (1+ 1/ ho ( rac{\partial ho}{\partial T})_p T rac{dp} ho$$

low speed incompressible flow:

$$ ho c_p rac{DT}{Dt} = abla \cdot (\hat{k} abla T)$$

$$
au_{ij} = -P \delta_{ij} + \mu [
rac{\partial V_i}{\partial x_j} +
rac{\partial V_j}{\partial x_i}
-2/3 abla V
]+
\mu rac{2k}{3(k+3)} abla V +
\mu rac{2k}{3(k+3)} abla V
\approx
T_{rot} -T_t
$$

各个方向的温度 $\approx T_{ij} - T_{eq}$

$\mu$ : dynamic viscosity coefficient
$\hat{k}$::heat conduction coefficient

$$
\mu \approx rac{1}{3}c l
$$

  • c: 声速,
  • l: mean free path
entry.summary: Book: 输运理论 黄祖洽

entry.title: 常用命令和工具
entry.content:
vim

vim 宏录制

  1. 在normal 模式下输入 qa ，开始记录操作，其中 a 代表vim下
    a 寄存器（可以改成其他寄存器如 b, c ,d )。

  2. 结束录制按 q。

  3. 使用宏：normal 模式下 输入 n@a , n 代表使用次数， a 是宏存放的位置。

行内公式

$x=\frac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac}}{2a}$
